query: SELECT COUNT(*) as total, SUM(CASE WHEN consultorId IS NULL THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) as sem_mentor, SUM(CASE WHEN consultorId IS NOT NULL THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) as com_mentor FROM alunos;
